channel.title: Blog Posts - Non-Tech on Aashish Koirala
channel.description: Recent content in Blog Posts - Non-Tech on Aashish Koirala

item.title: Oatmeal, it's what's for breakfast!
item.description: When I am in my healthy and fit zone, I get a lot done. It is quite clear there is no big secret to keeping fit - you exercise and you eat well. To that end, few would disagree that oatmeal is as healthy as they come when it comes to breakfast foods. Few would also disagree that making rolled oats is not a fun activity and eating rolled oats even less so.

item.title: Where the Crow Came to Die
item.description: I was running as fast as I could, but the yak kept gaining on me. All of a sudden, I found myself in my lodge room. I jumped on the bed, only to discover to my horror that the yak had made it to the room as well. With all its fury, the yak jumped on me. That is when I woke up from the vivid nightmare with cold sweat all over my body.
